name: The Root of all Evil (Whatahooda, sym-z, An Ordinary Cynic)
name_original: The Root of all Evil (Whatahooda, sym-z, An Ordinary Cynic)
description:
You are Sprig, a small tree stump who needs to find the root of evil and eradicate it before it reaches the forest!

DIRECTIONS: Use WASD to move and the ARROW KEYS to shoot. Walk over Elemental Puddles to gain there powers.

A game created for the Global Game Jam (GGJ) in 48 hours.

Credits: 

Christian Bryant - Programming/Game Design (GGJ User: whatahooda)

Cesar Rodriguez - Programming/Game Design/Playtesting/Sound Design (GGJ User: CesarRod2002)

Alex Liang - Composer/Sound Design/Game Design (GGJ User: acearthbound1994)

Jack Sims - 2D Artist/Game Design (GGJ User: sym-z)
